          <title>
            <string language="en">Colliding trolleys</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusammenstoßende Laufkatzen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chariots se heurtants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Troles colidindo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Carrelli scontrantesi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συγκρομένος καροτσάκια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Carretillas que chocan</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates two situations of two trolleys before and after collision, with their masses and velocities indicated.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">collisions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conservation of momentum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">trolleys</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">velocity</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt zwei Situationen des 
Zusammenstoßes zwei Laufkatzen vorher und nachher, wenn ihren Massen 
und Geschwindigkeiten angezeigt sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre deux situations de 
collision de deux chariots avant et après, avec les leurs masses et 
vitesses indiquées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra duas situações de 
uma colisão de dois troles before.and.after, com suas massas e 
velocidades indicadas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra due situazioni di 
uno scontro dei due carrelli prima e dopo, con le loro masse e 
velocità indicate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει δύο καταστάσεις δύο 
καροτσακιών πριν και μετά από τη σύγκρουση, με τις μάζες και τις 
ταχύτητές τους που υποδεικνύονται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra dos situaciones de la
colisión de dos carretillas antes y después, con sus masas y 
velocidades indicadas.</string>
          </description>
